description: FrankenPHP/Caddy monitoring optimized for Symfony applications. Focus on worker health, restarts, and performance.

panels.description: Rate of worker restarts per second - HIGH VALUES = crashes/memory issues
panels.title: 🚨 Worker Restart Rate

panels.description: Resident memory - watch for growth indicating leaks

panels.title: Thread Utilization %
